name: Rite Aid Senior Day
description: 5x rewards points on first Wednesday of month for 65+
fullDescription: Rite Aid offers seniors aged 65+ 5x rewards points on qualifying purchases the first Wednesday of each month with their free Rite Aid Rewards card.
whatTheyOffer:
- 5x rewards points on qualifying purchases
- First Wednesday of each month
- Free Rite Aid Rewards card required
- Points redeemable for discounts on future purchases
- Ages 65 and older eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Sign up for free Rite Aid Rewards card
2. Visit Rite Aid on first Wednesday of month
3. Present rewards card at checkout
4. Earn 5x points on qualifying purchases
5. Ages 65 and older eligible
keywords: Rite Aid, senior discount, 65+, first Wednesday, pharmacy, retail, rewards points
